abstract: The Government Accountability Office is out with a statement that backs Boeing in its bitter protests over the award of an Air Force tanker contract to Airbus, its European rival, which paired with Northrop Grumman to submit a bid.
lead_paragraph: The Government Accountability Office is out with a statement that backs Boeing in its bitter protests over the award of an Air Force tanker contract to Airbus, its European rival, which paired with Northrop Grumman to submit a bid.
